mapper.select: select count(1) as totalcnt from VTCONNECTION where DEL_YN = 'N' and (VNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or VURL like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')

select VCONNID , VNAME from VTCONNECTION where DEL_YN = 'N' AND (VNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or VURL like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') order by VCONNID desc OFFSET ${first}-1 ROWS FETCH FIRST ${countPerPage} ROWS ONLY

select VCONNID , VNAME , VDBSCHEMA , VURL , VDRIVER , '' as VPW , VTYPE , VQUERY , VID , MAX_ACTIVE , MIN_IDLE , TIMEOUT , EXPORTCOUNT , VCONNOPT , VPOOLOPT , VDBVERSION from VTCONNECTION where DEL_YN = 'N' AND VCONNID =#{vconnid}
mapper.delete: update VTCONNECTION set USE_YN = 'N' ,DEL_YN = 'Y' ,VPW ='empty' where VCONNID =#{vconnid}
mapper.select: select count(1) as totalcnt from VTUSER where USER_ROLE = 'USER' and (UNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or UID like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')

select a.*, a.REG_DT as CHAR_CRE_DT from VTUSER a where USER_ROLE = 'USER' and (UNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or UID like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') order by VIEWID desc OFFSET ${first}-1 ROWS FETCH FIRST ${countPerPage} ROWS ONLY
